com.plexus.sam.config
Class ConfigGroup

java.lang.Object
  com.plexus.sam.config.ConfigGroup

public class ConfigGroup
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a group of configuration values, it is identified in the Configuration by its name. It reads and writes directly from the DOM tree of the configuration XML file.

Changes can be notified by registering a ChangeListener.

Author:
plexus
